name: DeepBurner Disc Project
summary: Learn about .DBR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: DBR files are saved in an XML format, but they should only be edited using the software, not a text or XML editor.

description: Project file created by DeepBurner, a CD and DVD burning application; includes references to the disc content data as well as autorun and disc author information; used for backups, photo albums, and audio and video discs.
